commit message:
Refactored all dialogs that don't contain a custom view or similar
complications to use DialogFragment, fixed a couple of minor bugs in
them and moved error codes to a separate class.
Fix small issue with wrong login data dialog.

Refactor the upload conflict dialog.
Further refactoring of Dialogs to DialogFragment.
Refactor preferences to use PreferenceFragmentCompat instead of
SherlockPreferenceActivity. Added temporary solution for
PreferenceFragmentCompat till we can switch to the directly supplied by
google version.

Move target Android version to 17.
Final lot of Dialog refactoring.
Update target Android version to 5.01
Use Uri builder to construct search URL.
Update build tools to v.23.0.2.
Replace deprecated method with ContextCompat.getDrawable().

Refactored Logic to live in Application and not in Main, reduce code
duplication and other improvements.
Improve logging
Attempt at protecting against weird crashes in google code
Cleanup to avoid lint moaning in AS.
Fix angle brackets in markdown
Improve layout

Use correct activity for dialogs in BoxPicker, protect against potential
IllegalStateExceptions with DialogFragment (catch, log and report).
Add newline and indentation to GPX output.
Update build number.
Store multiselect and combo value delimiter if not default value.
Updated preset

Display multiselects with a small number of entries as multiple
checkboxes.
Update introduction in Russian
Avoid infrequent crash when resuming preference screen.
Updated android version and build number.
Updated preset
Fix issue with multiselect with descriptions producing garbage.
Fix issues with preset values not maintaining order.
Updated information file for taginfo.
Minor refactoring to get rid of confusing names.

Refactor tag reversing, apply to way nodes and actually save changes to
relation members with direction dependent roles.
Refactor SavingHelper
Add missing icon
Update build number.

Changing the id on newly created elements requires rehash. start proper
activity to change APIs.
Update taginfo file
Fix taginfo output
Fix missing curly bracket

Fix crash if exiting with GPS tracking enabled (this was a regression
dur to the refactorin of Logic)
Updated preset and translations.

Workaround to detect home button being pressed in fragement in older
android versions.
Small improvements and fixes.
Update build number.
Fix progress bar mixup.
Two typo fixes
Avoid NPE when checking role conflicts
Update build number
fix tag selected action bar title

Debugging improvements and bug fix for predicting first number of a side
of a road
Fix issue with node selection post call of PropertyEditor

Save the 10 last changeset comments and source strings, prepopulate the
dialog with the last version used.
Update android version and build number. Cleanup imports.
Fix SQL quoting issue.
Add custom key listener for the upload dialog.
Dismiss dropdwon when dismissing softkeyboard.
Write empty task state file even if empty.
Don't create a crash dump is activity is paused
New translation
Update build number
Updated preset and preset translations
Fix crash when editing street names
Updated presets and translations.
Updated build number.

Fix issue with MRU preset fragment not updating when it is in the form
fragment.
Update build number
Typo fix
Use Uri builder to construct URLs.

Merge pull request #416 from johnjohndoe/uri-builder

Use Uri builder to construct URLs.
Numerous improvements and fixes in the imagery alignment mode.
Update build number.
Use support lib in ABS
Swedish translation.
Work started on migration to appcompat
More styling and menu fixes, preferences work now with some exceptions.
Updated build instructions
Correct target and min-sdk
Some work on updating the drawer code.

Added MultiSelectListPreference from v14 support library, fixed
remaining preference issues.
Menu fixes for old Android versions.
Some work on styling and menus.
Fix grade build config and some lint warnings.
Typo fix
Fix for implicit intent issue  in Lolipop and higher.
Add a workaround to stop annoying lint messages.

Fix numerous menu issues and undo ActionView, some lint issues removed
and started migration to ToolBar.
Use AppCompatDialog instead of Dialog, vairous lint fixes.
Various lint related fixes.
Use MenuItemCompat
Home grown ProgressDialog replacement.
Some layout improvements.

Use additional toolbar as replacement for split action bar in main map
view and action modes.
Only display handles when really needed.
Make top action bar optional and use FABs for lock and zoom.
Make light theme default on all devices.
Import clean up
Typo fixes and updates build doc and readme.
Re-refactor UI code to use ActionMenuView, various small bugfixes.
Added design support library to gradle build.
More UI work
Add awful hack for 'near' full screen mode with status bar displayed.
Fix HelpViewer drawer toggle.

Work around onAttach(Activity activity) deprecation issue, hide/show
controls properly during OAuth handshake.
Don't set SHOW_AS_ACTION_ALWAYS on menus that don't have an icon.
API can be in read only status too.

Replace indeterminate actionbar progress indicator with dialog, fix some
issues uploading tasks.
Some support for MatchType.NONE
Attempt to scroll housenumber field up as far as possible.
Fixed crash and themeing for API and Preset dialogs.
Codes fixes from FindBugs
Updated presets, some cleanup and new ecplise project stuff.

Make full screen behaviour configurable, don't try to evenly space icons
in the bars on larger devices.
include match='none' in preset doc
Display configured accont name in advance prefs if set
Create a .nomedia file in the tile cache directory.

Make sure that bottom menu is not covered in full screen mode, fixed
some remaining not converted dialogs.
Don't darken non-downloaded areas in locked mode.

Get ids from resource file, fix issues with using incorrect map
reference.
Rearranged advanced preferences a bit.
Change color to colorAccent

More or less working visual indication of disabled FABs, started wotk on
re-themeing the PropertyEditor.
Protect against concurrent modifiation of the layer list
Styling fixes viewpages and split pane layout.
Fix issue with uploading OSMOSE bugs.
Working styling with appcompat.
Updated preset and made parsing a bit more robust.
Make preferences available in all element selection modes.

Refactor the tile caching code to store everything in a database (not
mb-tiles compatible) and try to store that on a removable device to
avoid cluttering up internal storage.
hideLock should really hide not show
Support 'editable' field in presets, updated preset.

Make number of tile download threads configurable, use a dialog for
larger combos in the form editor.

Don't generate crash dumps for Progress and Error alerts dialog
fragments.
Lots of styling fixes.
Update build number.
Fix some lint warnings don't let TextView for Combo dialog get focus.
Fix issue with preset search results not visible on Marshmallow
Some code cleanup and improvement for the tile cache.

Move large multiselects to dialog and fix remaining issues with
scrolling etc.
Updated preset and translations
Allow editing of tags not associated with a preset in the form editor.
Doc update, some more UI tweaking

Add function to split way(s) at marked position in 'New' mode, improved
selection context menu to list way membership of nodes.

Better turn restriction adding mode that doesn't require ways to be
pre-split, made tolerance indicator separate and more opaque in modes.
Disable form row while dialogs are shown.
Update preset

Fix advancedprefs db being created in wrong place, protect agains NPE
when determining directory for tile cache.
Updated preset and build number
Improve messaging during restriction adding.

Fix numerous relation handling issues including undo of newly created
relation leading to inconsistent state.
Fix issue with long press on undo button not working.

When preset is applied to empty set of tags, assume that it is actually
the best one and use it for matching tags.
Update build number
Use applied preset when non-is found too.
Make autocomplete text files in upload dialog full width of dialog.
Import clean up
Limit the number of notifications displayed
Update build number

Remove duplicate config_maxInlineValues_summary string.

+ Introduced in commit 23de9481a467167bc7ccbd37cc3a2cf83d374b2e.

Merge pull request #443 from johnjohndoe/remove-duplicate-config-string

Remove duplicate config_maxInlineValues_summary string.

Fix tagged node without icon rendering, display house numbers of
building centroids, some further code improvements.
Add automatic locking function.
Update build number
Respect zoom limit for icons on closed ways too.
Some minor improvements auto lock.
Use current cache size not max.

Geometry improvement handles should not work when relations are
selected.
Fix clipboard related crash on pre Honeycomb devices.
Update buildnumber.
Prelim release notes for 0.9.8

Added zoom to selection function, bug fix in way bounding box
calculation.
Update build number
Don't preserve zoom level when trying to show selected element.

Store UI settings that are really preferences in preferences and not in
the state file.
Added 0.9.8 relase notes

Don't use google standard behaviour (crash)

Gracefully down grade the database if necessary instead of blowing up.
New build number
Bumped version numbers to make google happy.
